My dear Frank:
I wouldn’t have blamed you if you had followed through on
your notion for "Reserved for WNYC", but I didn’t know that you
didn't get it on time. It w&s just delayed in the rewriting and
retyping. It’s too bad, but I hope I'm fofgiven.
I've been very busy and I have just seen your last letter.
I haven't any doubt you know what is best to do with the WNYC
material.
Very sincerely yours,
Director
